name: Peanut Butter Chocolate Zucchini Muffins
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup coconut sugar or brown sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the ground flax seeds with water. Stir well and let it sit for about 3-5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the ground flax seeds with water. Stir well and let it sit for about 3-5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, combine the rest of the ingredients (except for the peanut butter and the peanuts) in a medium bowl. Stir gently with a wooden spoon until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, combine the rest of the ingredients (except for the peanut butter and the peanuts) in a medium bowl. Stir gently with a wooden spoon until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Place baking cups in a muffin pan and divide the mixture evenly. Stir in some peanut butter and top each muffin with some peanuts.
recipeInstructions.name: Place baking cups in a muffin pan and divide the mixture evenly. Stir in some peanut butter and top each muffin with some peanuts.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for about 15 minutes at 360째F (180째C). Let cool down in the muffin tin for at least half an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for about 15 minutes at 360째F (180째C). Let cool down in the muffin tin for at least half an hour.
